Label.en: He was living in the time of Napoleon III, who was trying to restore Catholicism to France
Label.fr: Il vivait à l'époque de Napoleon III, qui essayait de restaurer la fois Catholique en France
Label.es: He was living in the time of Napoleon III, who was trying to restore Catholicism to France
Label.zh: He was living in the time of Napoleon III, who was trying to restore Catholicism to France

Label.en: But the anti-Catholic sentiment of the recent French revolution would have been fresh in everyone's memory!
Label.fr: Mais les sentiments anti-Catholiques de la révolution française étaient encore dans tous les esprits !
Label.es: But the anti-Catholic sentiment of the recent French revolution would have been fresh in everyone's memory!
Label.zh: But the anti-Catholic sentiment of the recent French revolution would have been fresh in everyone's memory!

Label.en: So it's no surprise that Delaroche, a firm Catholic, would be lamenting Christian persecution in his painting!
Label.fr: Il n'est pas surprenant que Delaroche, un fervent Catholique, se lamente dans ses toiles des persécutions subies par les chrétiens  !
Label.es: So it's no surprise that Delaroche, a firm Catholic, would be lamenting Christian persecution in his painting!
Label.zh: So it's no surprise that Delaroche, a firm Catholic, would be lamenting Christian persecution in his painting!

Label.en: My story is over! So let's move on...
Label.fr: Fin de l'histoire et début de la suite...
Label.es: My story is over! So let's move on...
Label.zh: My story is over! So let's move on...
